name: Recombinase Polymerase Amplification RPA Assay Set-up Procedure
description: This document provides a Standard Operating Procedure for the preparation of Recombinase Polymerase Amplification reaction mixtures using a standard molecular laboratory set-up. It describes the process and formulation required to set up an individual RPA reaction using the reagents available in the TwistAmp Liquid Exo kit, available from TwistDx Ltd. The method has been optimised at the National Oceanography Centre and is suitable for the real-time amplification of a varieity of DNA sequence targets.

about.name: Recombinase Polymerase Amplification
instrument: Nuclease or other DNA removal agents
about.location: This protocol can be applied in a laboratory equipped for molecular biology testing
about.result: Aqueous solution containing amplicons from real-time amplification of a of defined DNA sequence targets
